  16. (* Common subexpression elimination by value numbering over extended
  17.    basic blocks. *)

  19. ‌type op_class =
  20.   | Op_pure     (* pure, produce one result *)
  21.   | Op_checkbound     (* checkbound-style: no result, can raise an exn *)
  22.   | Op_load of Asttypes.mutable_flag  (* memory load *)
  23.   | Op_store of bool  (* memory store, false = init, true = assign *)
  24.   | Op_other   (* anything else that does not allocate nor store in memory *)

  26. class cse_generic : object
  27.   (* The following methods can be overridden to handle processor-specific
  28.      operations. *)

  30.   method class_of_operation: Mach.operation -> op_class

  32.   method is_cheap_operation: Mach.operation -> bool
  33.     (* Operations that are so cheap that it isn't worth factoring them. *)

  35.   (* The following method is the entry point and should not be overridden *)
  36.   method fundecl: Mach.fundecl -> Mach.fundecl

  38. end
